data.text: Summer training camp season came around.
data.processed: <story>Summer training camp season came around.

data.text:
We had to train, of course, but there was plenty to do in the 
downtime. Swimming on the beach, a fireworks show, the 
school was even going to host a barbecue.
data.processed:
<story>We had to train, of course, but there was plenty to do in the 
<story>downtime. Swimming on the beach, a fireworks show, the 
<story>school was even going to host a barbecue.

data.text:
I'm gonna run, Take my time. 
...'Ey, what're you just standing there for?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I'm gonna run, Take my time. 
<story>...'Ey, what're you just standing there for?

data.text:
...Tsk. Go do it in the shade. And hydrate while you're at it. 
It'd be a pain in the ass to do a do-over.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Tsk. Go do it in the shade. And hydrate while you're at it. 
<story>It'd be a pain in the ass to do a do-over.

data.text:
I felt like Air Shakur and I had gotten a bit closer than before. 
But still, if you'd asked if she could depend on me when it really 
counts...
data.processed:
<story>I felt like Air Shakur and I had gotten a bit closer than before. 
<story>But still, if you'd asked if she could depend on me when it really 
<story>counts...

data.text:
...Well, anyway, summer sure is a pretty eventful season. 
Time to take advantage of all the things to do and get closer to 
her!
data.processed:
<story>...Well, anyway, summer sure is a pretty eventful season. 
<story>Time to take advantage of all the things to do and get closer to 
<story>her!

data.text: Well, that was the plan, but――
data.processed: <story>Well, that was the plan, but――

data.text:
You wanna go to the beach? 
It's hot as hell out there, why go if we're not gonna be training?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You wanna go to the beach? 
<story>It's hot as hell out there, why go if we're not gonna be training?

data.text:
Fireworks? 
Sounds tiring. Sounds annoying. Sound illogical. 
Pass.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Fireworks? 
<story>Sounds tiring. Sounds annoying. Sound illogical. 
<story>Pass.

data.text: Hell no.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>Hell no.

data.text:
You were gonna ask about the barbecue, weren't you? Yeah, I 
figured. So what next? 'Wanna go to the pool?' 'Wanna go 
camping?' Don't get all excited just 'cuz it's summer, dumbass.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>You were gonna ask about the barbecue, weren't you? Yeah, I 
<story>figured. So what next? 'Wanna go to the pool?' 'Wanna go 
<story>camping?' Don't get all excited just 'cuz it's summer, dumbass.

data.text:
I know you were lookin' forward to this, but it's not happening. 
The only thing I ever planned to do is train.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I know you were lookin' forward to this, but it's not happening. 
<story>The only thing I ever planned to do is train.

data.text:
I don't need to play around or hoot and holler or whatever. 
That's all noise to me. You oughtta know this already.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I don't need to play around or hoot and holler or whatever. 
<story>That's all noise to me. You oughtta know this already.

data.text:
I did, in fact, already know Air Shakur didn't like noisy stuff. 
It was probably better if I didn't invite her to loud, crowded 
events like those.

choices.text: ...But I'm still going to keep trying!

data.processed:
<story>I did, in fact, already know Air Shakur didn't like noisy stuff. 
<story>It was probably better if I didn't invite her to loud, crowded 
<story>events like those.

data.text:
But there had to be something to do that she could enjoy, too. 
As I was thinking it over―― I noticed a tiny speck of light 
flashing in the distance.
data.processed:
<story>But there had to be something to do that she could enjoy, too. 
<story>As I was thinking it over―― I noticed a tiny speck of light 
<story>flashing in the distance.

data.text:
Firefly watching was a classic summer activity, and you could do 
it without making a sound. Maybe she'd be up for that, even just 
a little bit?
data.processed:
<story>Firefly watching was a classic summer activity, and you could do 
<story>it without making a sound. Maybe she'd be up for that, even just 
<story>a little bit?

data.text:
With that little speck's encouragement, I started searching, night 
after night, for a river with fireflies to watch. But――
data.processed:
<story>With that little speck's encouragement, I started searching, night 
<story>after night, for a river with fireflies to watch. But――

data.text: I couldn't find anything. It was even harder than I expected.
data.processed: <story>I couldn't find anything. It was even harder than I expected.

data.text: That first tiny speck must've been a trick of the eye... I couldn't find one firefly, much less a river full of them.
data.processed: That first tiny speck must've been a trick of the eye... I couldn't find one firefly, much less a river full of them.

data.text:
Maybe it just wasn't in the cards this year. 
I zoned out, thinking about giving up, when I felt a hand on my 
shoulder.
data.processed:
<story>Maybe it just wasn't in the cards this year. 
<story>I zoned out, thinking about giving up, when I felt a hand on my 
<story>shoulder.

data.text:
Hey, you. Stop right there. Show me some ID. 
...We got a tip there's been someone creepin' around all night.
data.processed:
<story>Hey, you. Stop right there. Show me some ID. 
<story>...We got a tip there's been someone creepin' around all night.

data.text: Got youuu.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Got youuu.

data.text:
Y'looked like you were tweaking all day.
Did you really think I wouldn't catch on?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Y'looked like you were tweaking all day.
<story>Did you really think I wouldn't catch on?

data.text: C'mon, tell me what you're up to.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>C'mon, tell me what you're up to.

data.text:
All I could do now was fess up. 
I sheepishly admitted I'd been looking for fireflies, and why I was 
doing it.
data.processed:
<story>All I could do now was fess up. 
<story>I sheepishly admitted I'd been looking for fireflies, and why I was 
<story>doing it.

data.text:
...Firefly watching. 
Figured it'd be something like that. You really don't know how to 
quit.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Firefly watching. 
<story>Figured it'd be something like that. You really don't know how to 
<story>quit.

data.text:
Didn't I tell you? You don't need to get along with me. 
Because――
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Didn't I tell you? You don't need to get along with me. 
<story>Because――

data.text: I just don't get you.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>I just don't get you.

data.text:
I can't understand it. 
You clearly know how it is, but you still won't give up.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>I can't understand it. 
<story>You clearly know how it is, but you still won't give up.

data.text:
At first I thought you just felt sorry for me, or wanted to satisfy 
your sense of self-superiority. But that can't be right.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>At first I thought you just felt sorry for me, or wanted to satisfy 
<story>your sense of self-superiority. But that can't be right.

data.text:
...So what are you doing all this for? 
Out of a sense of duty? Think it's your creed? Is having one of 
those the hot new tech?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...So what are you doing all this for? 
<story>Out of a sense of duty? Think it's your creed? Is having one of 
<story>those the hot new tech?

data.text: The answer was so simple, I surprised myself.
data.processed: <story>The answer was so simple, I surprised myself.

data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>.......Huh?

data.text:
Before we even met, she already had a partner that could do 
anything. With it, she could get by without needing a 『trainer』.
data.processed:
<story>Before we even met, she already had a partner that could do 
<story>anything. With it, she could get by without needing a 『trainer』.

data.text:
But, even if she was content with not putting her trust in me, 
what if, somehow, there was a challenge she couldn't take on 
alone――
data.processed:
<story>But, even if she was content with not putting her trust in me, 
<story>what if, somehow, there was a challenge she couldn't take on 
<story>alone――

data.text:
If she kept shutting me out, I'd never be able to help her. 
...I explained those thoughts to her.

choices.text: That's why I won't stop trying to get involved.
choices.processed: <size=36>That's why I won't stop trying to get involved.</size>

data.processed:
<story>If she kept shutting me out, I'd never be able to help her. 
<story>...I explained those thoughts to her.

data.text:
...Heh, so you've been inviting me out at every little oppurtunity, 
just 'cause you're worried about some 'what if'?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Heh, so you've been inviting me out at every little oppurtunity, 
<story>just 'cause you're worried about some 'what if'?

data.text:
First you worm your way into the net cafe, then you invite 
yourself to go shopping. ...And now here you are, scrounging 
around for fireflies night after night.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>First you worm your way into the net cafe, then you invite 
<story>yourself to go shopping. ...And now here you are, scrounging 
<story>around for fireflies night after night.

data.text:
What was your plan if you actually pissed me off? 
Forget shutting you out, I'd be cutting you off.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: Because I knew you weren't really mad.
choices.processed: <size=42>Because I knew you weren't really mad.</size>

data.processed:
<story>What was your plan if you actually pissed me off? 
<story>Forget shutting you out, I'd be cutting you off.

data.text:
She's not the type to hold back. 
If she really wanted to cut me off, she would've done it already.
data.processed:
<story>She's not the type to hold back. 
<story>If she really wanted to cut me off, she would've done it already.

data.text: .......You're irritating as hell.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>.......You're irritating as hell.

data.text:
Don't run your mouth like you've figured it all out. And the hell 
do you mean, 'what if'? Don't get all freaked out about something 
if it might not even happen.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Don't run your mouth like you've figured it all out. And the hell 
<story>do you mean, 'what if'? Don't get all freaked out about something 
<story>if it might not even happen.

data.text: ...You're completely illogical. Always have been.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...You're completely illogical. Always have been.

data.text:
.......If you wanna find fireflies, you gotta look somewhere with 
more shade. The dirt here's too hard, and there's not enough 
grass. Bet you haven't looked upstream.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>.......If you wanna find fireflies, you gotta look somewhere with 
<story>more shade. The dirt here's too hard, and there's not enough 
<story>grass. Bet you haven't looked upstream.

data.text:
She started walking in the complete opposite direction of the 
campgrounds. Shrinking in the distance, with no signs of 
stopping――
data.processed:
<story>She started walking in the complete opposite direction of the 
<story>campgrounds. Shrinking in the distance, with no signs of 
<story>stopping――

data.text:
Aren't you going to come watch? 
...I don't hate fireflies.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Aren't you going to come watch? 
<story>...I don't hate fireflies.
